sentences.en: an abundance of wavy red hair
At the feast there was an abundance of food and drink.
sentences.cn: 宴会上有丰盛的食品和饮料.

sentences.en: At the feast there was food and drink in abundance.
At the party there was food in abundance.
Chastity is a wealth that comes from abundance of love.
sentences.cn: 贞操是从丰富的爱情中生出来的财富.

sentences.en: He was a lovely person indeed, of abundance of good humour.
sentences.cn: 他实在是个可爱的人, 脾气也非常好.

sentences.en: I love these colours because they symbolize mellowness, abundance , strength and happiness.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢这秋色,因为它表示着成熟 、 昌盛和繁荣,也意味着愉快、欢乐和富强.

sentences.en: Irrigation is easy in the South because of the abundance of water.
Modern pharmacology offers an abundance of tranquilizers, antidepressants and anti - anxiety drugs.
sentences.cn: 现代药理学提供了许许多多的镇静剂 、 抗抑郁剂和 抗 焦虑剂.

sentences.en: One quality the team possessed in abundance was fighting spirit.
sentences.cn: 该队的一大特点是斗志昂扬。

sentences.en: The area has an abundance of wildlife.
sentences.cn: 这片地区有丰富的野生动植物。

sentences.en: The shallow sea bed yields up an abundance of food.
sentences.cn: 浅海床提供了丰富的食物。

sentences.en: The tree yields an abundance of fruit.
There is an abundance of commodity supplies on the markets.
There was abundance of cold water to finish the feast with.
sentences.cn: 最后,他俩又饱饱地喝了一通凉水,结束了这顿“宴席”.

sentences.en: There was an abundance of corn last year.
This area of Mexico has an abundance of safe beaches and a pleasing climate.
sentences.cn: 墨西哥的这个地区有大量的安全沙滩与宜人的气候。
